Investigation finds source of rat foot found in toddler’s mouth when eating Pak’n Save precooked garlic bread https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-awamutu-rat-foot-found-in-toddlers-mouth-when-eating-pakn-save-precooked-garlic-bread-from-home/PUOKK6KINZACVBN2FGWDRJKT5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-awamutu-rat-foot-found-in-toddlers-mouth-when-eating-pakn-save-precooked-garlic-bread-from-home/PUOKK6KINZACVBN2FGWDRJKT5I/ Kirsty WynnAn investigation found that the rodent's foot was raw and not in bread when purchased. Could Donald Trump go to prison? If he does, the Secret Service goes, too https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/could-donald-trump-go-to-prison-if-he-does-the-secret-service-goes-too/X2NY4ZGF2VD5BOUPAYL3WKYNNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/could-donald-trump-go-to-prison-if-he-does-the-secret-service-goes-too/X2NY4ZGF2VD5BOUPAYL3WKYNNY/ William K.
